      port: 443

      operator: NotIn
      values:

##### FILE: Default_scheduler.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Pod/kube-scheduler:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    component: kube-scheduler
    tier: control-plane
  name: kube-scheduler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - kube-scheduler
    - --authentication-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --authorization-kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --bind-address=127.0.0.1
    - --kubeconfig=/etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
    - --leader-elect=true
    - --port=0
    image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-scheduler:v1.19.4
    imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
    livenessProbe:
      failureThreshold: 8
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /healthz
        port: 10259
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    name: kube-scheduler
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
    startupProbe:
      failureThreshold: 24
      httpGet:
        host: 127.0.0.1
        path: /healthz
        port: 10259
        scheme: HTTPS
      initialDelaySeconds: 10
      periodSeconds: 10
      timeoutSeconds: 15
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
      name: kubeconfig
      readOnly: true
  hostNetwork: true
  priorityClassName: system-node-critical
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /etc/kubernetes/scheduler.conf
      type: FileOrCreate
    name: kubeconfig
status: {}

---

apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  generation: 1
  labels:
    app: sidecar-injector
    istio.io/rev: test-dev2
    istio.io/tag: default

- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1beta1
  - v1

    service:
      name: istiod-test-dev2
      namespace: istio-system
      path: /inject
      port: 443
  failurePolicy: Fail
  matchPolicy: Equivalent
  name: rev.namespace.sidecar-injector.istio.io

    matchExpressions:

      values:

      operator: DoesNotExist

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/md2pdf:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/md2pdf:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

Generation completed successfully.

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

metadata:
  labels:
    app: istiod
    istio: istiod
    istio.io/rev: default
    release: my-release
  name: istiod-default-validator
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1beta1
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: istiod
      namespace: istio-system
      path: /validate
  failurePolicy: Ignore
  name: validation.istio.io
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - security.istio.io
    - networking.istio.io
    - telemetry.istio.io
    - extensions.istio.io
    apiVersions:
    - '*'
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    resources:
    - '*'
  sideEffects: None

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/md2pdf:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: md2pdf

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

    storageclass.kubernetes.io/is-default-class: "true"
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: EnsureExists
  name: standard
  namespace: default
provisioner: kubernetes.io/cinder

---

##### FILE: defaultapi-pod.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/defaultapi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: defaultapi
  name: defaultapi-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: defaultapi
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: defaultapi
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: crowsi/httpcatcherdecoy:1.1.2
        name: defaultapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

##### FILE: defaultapi-pod_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/NetworkPolicy/limit-defaultapi-communication:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: limit-defaultapi-communication
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 8000
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: traefik
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: traefik
  - ports:
    - port: 8000
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: defaultapi
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---

      app: scheduler-test

      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx

          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.azure.com/agentpool: linux2
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: nodepool/scale
        value: static

##### FILE: define_volumes-1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/busybox:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: busybox
  name: busybox
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: busybox
    name: busybox1
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/foo
      name: default
  - args:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: busybox
    name: busybox2
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/foo
      name: default
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: default
status: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/busybox
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/busybox failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/busybox failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/busybox failed:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/busybox:

kind: Pod
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: busybox
  name: busybox
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/foo
      name: default
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  restartPolicy: Never
  volumes:
  - name: default
    persistentVolumeClaim:
      claimName: mypvc
status: {}

##### FILE: delete_secrets1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingAdmissionPolicy/secrets-store-sync-controller-delete-policy:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1beta1
kind: ValidatingAdmissionPolicy
metadata:
  name: secrets-store-sync-controller-delete-policy
  namespace: default
spec:
  failurePolicy: Fail
  matchConditions:
  - expression: request.userInfo.username == 'system:serviceaccount:'+params.data.controllerNamespace+':'+params.data.controllerName
    name: userIsController
  matchConstraints:
    resourceRules:
    - apiGroups:
      - ""
      apiVersions:
      - v1
      operations:
      - DELETE
      resources:
      - secrets
  paramKind:
    apiVersion: v1
    kind: ConfigMap
  validations:
  - expression: "false"
    message: The controller is not allowed to delete secrets.
    messageExpression: string(params.data.controllerName)  + ' has failed to ' +  string(request.operation)
      + ' secrets in the ' + string(request.namespace) + ' namespace. The controller
      is not allowed to delete secrets.'
    reason: Forbidden

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: delete-job
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sleep
        - "10"
        image: busybox
        name: sleep-container
      restartPolicy: Never
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 30

##### FILE: delete-ns-cdi.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Namespace/cdi:
$patch: delete
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: cdi
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/cdi:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: cdi
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/cdi:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: cdi
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/cdi:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno

    limits.cpu: "4"

##### FILE: delivery-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/delivery:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-response-headers: X-User,X-Email,X-UserId,X-First-Name,X-Last-Name
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-signin: http://$host/signin
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/auth-url: http://auth.auth.svc.cluster.local:9000/auth
  name: delivery
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: arch.homework
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: delivery
            port:
              number: 9000
        path: /delivery/reserve
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: delivery
            port:
              number: 9000
        path: /delivery/cancel
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: samiksha0202/frontend-app:latest
        name: frontend-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: delta-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/delta-example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: delta-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 7
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: delta-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: delta-example
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/pause:3.1
        name: pause
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
      topologySpreadConstraints:
      - labelSelector:
          matchLabels:
            app: delta-example
        maxSkew: 1
        topologyKey: delta
        whenUnsatisfiable: DoNotSchedule

---

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

      protocol: UDP

        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

    matchLabels: {}

kind: Deployment

  name: netperf-10
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: netperf-10
  template:

      annotations:
        kubernetes.io/egress-bandwidth: 10M
      labels:
        run: netperf-10
    spec:

##### FILE: demo_ds.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/testds:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: testds
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      zgroup: testDS
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        zgroup: testDS
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: udp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 69
          protocol: UDP
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node.cloudprovider.kubernetes.io/uninitialized
        value: "true"

---

  namespace: default
spec:
  externalIPs:
  - 192.0.2.233

    port: 20080
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  - name: tftp
    port: 20069
    protocol: UDP
    targetPort: 69
  selector:
    zgroup: testDS
  type: NodePort

kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: testds
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      zgroup: testDS
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        zgroup: testDS
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: udp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 69
          protocol: UDP
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node.cloudprovider.kubernetes.io/uninitialized
        value: "true"

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/testserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: testserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      zgroup: testServer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        test: hostfw
        zgroup: testServer
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver:1.10.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: udp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 69
          protocol: UDP
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node.cloudprovider.kubernetes.io/uninitialized
        value: "true"

##### FILE: demo_init-container-nginx_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mynamespace/Pod/mypod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  labels:
    app: myapp
  name: mypod
  namespace: mynamespace
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: myapp-container
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  initContainers:
  - command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - wget -O /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubernetes/website/main/content/en/examples/application/nginx-app.yaml
    image: busybox
    name: init-download-file
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: shared-data
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: shared-data

---

apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: demo-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: demo-viewer-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: demo-operator
  name: demo-viewer-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - tutorial.operator
  resources:
  - demoes
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - tutorial.operator
  resources:
  - demoes/status
  verbs:
  - get

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: demo11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/demo-app-hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-app-hpa
  name: demo-app-hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  behavior:
    scaleDown:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 2
        type: Pods
        value: 2
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10
    scaleUp:
      policies:
      - periodSeconds: 2
        type: Pods
        value: 2
      selectPolicy: Max
      stabilizationWindowSeconds: 10
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - pods:
      metric:
        name: sum_http_server_requests_seconds_count_filted
      target:
        averageValue: 20m
        type: AverageValue
    type: Pods
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: demo-app

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/mem-example:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mem-example
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: mem-example

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: collector

  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP

        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system

##### FILE: demo35.yaml #####

  volumes:

    name: docker

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/mem-example:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: mem-example
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/mem-example:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: mem-example
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/mem-example:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: mem-example
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

  namespace: cpu-example

  replicas: 2

    matchLabels:
      app: meteormeadow
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: meteormeadow
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cpu
        - "1"
        - --timeout
        - 60s
        command:
        - stress
        image: polinux/stress
        name: meteormeadow-container

  namespace: default

  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend-app
      version: v1.0
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend-app
        version: v1.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: dhillevajja/dep-dmtest:2.0
        name: dep-con
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 24Mi

##### FILE: demo7_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: spc-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: spc-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: petclinic
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: petclinic
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: petclinic
        image: mysql:8.2
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 600Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: sql-vol
          subPath: data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: sql-vol
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi
      storageClassName: managed

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: infra-backend-v1
  name: infra-backend-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: infra-backend-v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: infra-backend-v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: gcr.io/k8s-staging-ingressconformance/echoserver:v20221109-7ee2f3e
        name: infra-backend-v1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 10m

##### FILE: demo-app11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/alb-demo-1:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    worker_processes auto;
    events {
    }
    http {
      server {
        listen 80 ;
        location = /_healthz {
          add_header Content-Type text/plain;
          return 200 'ok';
        }
        location / {
          add_header Content-Type text/plain;
          return 200 'Index';
        }
        location = /app1 {
          add_header Content-Type text/plain;
          return 200 'This is APP#1';
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: alb-demo-1
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: demo-app11_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/alb-demo-1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alb-demo-1
    version: v1
  name: alb-demo-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alb-demo-1
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alb-demo-1
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /_healthz
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: alb-demo-1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx
          name: alb-demo-1
          readOnly: true
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: alb-demo-1
        name: alb-demo-1

---

##### FILE: demo-app4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo-app/Deployment/demo-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    secret.reloader.stakater.com/reload: demo-app
  name: demo-app
  namespace: demo-app
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo-app
        azure.workload.identity/use: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: demo-app
        image: httpd
        name: demo-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      serviceAccountName: demo-app

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo-app/Ingress/demo-app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    appgw.ingress.kubernetes.io/health-probe-unhealthy-threshold: "2"
    appgw.ingress.kubernetes.io/request-timeout: "60"
    appgw.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "true"
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-issuer
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: azure/application-gateway
  name: demo-app
  namespace: demo-app
spec:
  rules:
  - host: demo-app.azure.rentrahisi.co.ke
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: demo-app
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - demo-app.azure.rentrahisi.co.ke
    secretName: tls-cert

---

##### FILE: demo-app5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/demo-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: demo-app
  name: demo-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-app
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: demo-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: localhost:32000/test:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: test
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 12
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: http
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

##### FILE: demo-app-deploy5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/${USER_NAME}:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ${USER_NAME}
  name: ${USER_NAME}
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ${USER_NAME}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ${USER_NAME}
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: formation-${USER_NAME}
        image: 479165877194.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/eks-demo-app:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: demo-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi

##### FILE: demo-app-deploy6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/${USER_NAME}:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ${USER_NAME}
  name: ${USER_NAME}
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ${USER_NAME}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ${USER_NAME}
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: formation-${USER_NAME}
        - name: IS_HTML
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: is_html
              name: ${USER_NAME}
        image: 479165877194.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/eks-demo-app:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: demo-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: home.html
            path: home.html
          name: ${USER_NAME}
        name: config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/${USER_NAME}:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ${USER_NAME}
  name: ${USER_NAME}
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ${USER_NAME}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ${USER_NAME}
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: formation-${USER_NAME}
        - name: IS_HTML
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: is_html
              name: ${USER_NAME}
        - name: TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: ${USER_NAME}
        image: 479165877194.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/eks-demo-app:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: demo-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: home.html
            path: home.html
          name: ${USER_NAME}
        name: config

##### FILE: demo-app-deploy8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/${USER_NAME}:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ${USER_NAME}
  name: ${USER_NAME}
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ${USER_NAME}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ${USER_NAME}
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          value: formation-${USER_NAME}
        - name: IS_HTML
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: is_html
              name: ${USER_NAME}
        - name: TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: token
              name: ${USER_NAME}
        image: 479165877194.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/eks-demo-app:latest
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: demo-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: ${USER_NAME}
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: home.html
            path: home.html
          name: ${USER_NAME}
        name: config

---

##### FILE: demo-app-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp
  name: webapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: USER_NAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-user
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: USER_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-password
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: DB_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mongo-url
              name: mongo-config
        image: jusjira/k8s-demo-svelte-webapp:v1.1
        name: webapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000

---

##### FILE: demo-app-ing.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/${USER_NAME}:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/configuration-snippet: |
      more_set_headers "Access-Control-Allow-Origin *";
      more_set_headers "Access-Control-Allow-Methods 'GET, POST, OPTIONS'";
      more_set_headers "Access-Control-Allow-Headers 'Content-Type, Authorization'";
      more_set_headers "Content-Security-Policy: frame-ancestors *;";
  name: ${USER_NAME}
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: ${USER_NAME}.el-khayali.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: ${USER_NAME}
            port:
              number: 8080
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

      zgroup: testapp

    metadata:

        zgroup: testapp

            port: 80

        name: udp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 69
          protocol: UDP

##### FILE: demo-customcalls_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/bytecounter-compiler:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: bytecounter-compiler
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - git config --global --add safe.directory /cilium; sleep infinity
    command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    image: quay.io/cilium/cilium-builder:162f5ef4fc1f306691f47ea59fd8ac8b58cb40ba@sha256:dfb73226fa3821ee514aa6a14d8fa450647a29c0a25692619a1680037eb89835
    name: cilium-builder
    securityContext:
      privileged: true
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /sys/fs/bpf
      name: bpf-maps
    - mountPath: /cilium
      name: cilium-src
    workingDir: /cilium
  hostNetwork: true
  nodeSelector:
    cilium.io/ci-node: k8s2
  tolerations:
  - key: node.kubernetes.io/not-ready
    operator: Exists
  - key: node.kubernetes.io/unreachable
    operator: Exists
  volumes:
  - hostPath:
      path: /sys/fs/bpf
      type: DirectoryOrCreate
    name: bpf-maps
  - hostPath:
      path: /home/vagrant/go/src/github.com/cilium/cilium
      type: Directory
    name: cilium-src

---

  name: demohello
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demohello
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 100%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demohello
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - hello
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: pbitty/hello-from:latest
        name: demohello-from
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 1

##### FILE: demo-deployment4_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/busybox-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    request.autodiskscaling.kubecost.com/enabled: "true"
    request.autodiskscaling.kubecost.com/interval: 7h
  name: busybox-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - infinity
        image: busybox
        name: busybox
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/folder
          name: volume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - date > /app/folder/date.txt
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: echo-date
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/folder
          name: volume
      securityContext: {}
      volumes:
      - name: volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: original-pvc

---

    matchLabels:

      - env:
        - name: SOME_ENV
          value: $SOME_ENV
        image: my-image
        name: my-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

            name: test-app-service
            port:
              number: 3001
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: demo-app-service

              number: 8080

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      id: app1
      zgroup: testapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        id: app1
        zgroup: testapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/cilium/demo-httpd:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
      - image: quay.io/cilium/echoserver-udp:v2020.01.30
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: udp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 69
          protocol: UDP
      nodeSelector:
        cilium.io/ci-node: k8s1
      serviceAccountName: app1-account
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/demo:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: demo
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/demo:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: demo
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

##### FILE: demo-nginx.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginxdata
      volumes:
      - name: nginxdata
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nginx-data

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: network-check
  namespace: network-check
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: network-check
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: network-check
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: PROMETHEUS_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: prometheus
        image: ghcr.io/apoorva64/network-check/network-check:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: network-check
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: http-echo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      serviceAccount: network-check-service-account
      serviceAccountName: network-check-service-account

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: prod
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/prod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: prod
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: demo-pod9.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod-demo-test:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: pod-demo-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    env:
    - name: level
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: levels
          name: config-demo-test
    - name: file_name
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: level_properties_file_name
          name: config-demo-test
    - name: file
      valueFrom:
        configMapKeyRef:
          key: level.properties
          name: config-demo-test
    image: alpine
    name: pod-demo-test-ctr
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /config
      name: config
      readOnly: true
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      items:
      - key: level.properties
        path: level.properties
      name: config-demo-test
    name: config

---

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/ns1:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: ns1
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/ns1:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: ns1
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/ns1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: ns1
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/ns1:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: ns1
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

##### FILE: demo-rw-test-cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/demo-rw-test-cm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  test-rw.js: |
    import { check, sleep } from 'k6';
    import remote from 'k6/x/remotewrite';

    export let options = {
        vus: 10,
        duration: '10s',
    };

    const client = new remote.Client({
        url: "http://localhost:9090/api/v1/write"
    });

    export default function () {
        let res = client.store([{
            "labels": [
                { "name": "__name__", "value": `my_cool_metric_${__VU}` },
                { "name": "service", "value": "bar" }
            ],
            "samples": [
                { "value": Math.random() * 100, }
            ]
        }]);
        check(res, {
            'is status 200': (r) => r.status === 200,
        });
        sleep(1)
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: demo-rw-test-cm
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

    app: my-app
  name: my-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SOME_ENV
          value: $SOME_ENV
        image: my-image
        name: my-app

##### FILE: deny_healthcheck_cm.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to fluent-bit/ConfigMap/fluent-bit-app-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  fluent-bit.conf: |
    [SERVICE]
        Flush                     5
        Grace                     30
        Log_Level                 info
        Daemon                    off
        HTTP_Server               ${HTTP_SERVER}
        HTTP_Listen               0.0.0.0
        HTTP_Port                 ${HTTP_PORT}
        storage.path              /var/fluent-bit/state/flb-storage/
        storage.sync              normal
        storage.checksum          off
        storage.backlog.mem_limit 5M
    @INCLUDE host-log.conf
  host-log.conf: |
    [INPUT]
        Name                tail
        Tag                 host.<Deployment Name>.dmesg
        Path                /var/log/containers/*<Deployment Name>-deployment-*

    [FILTER]
        Name        grep
        Match       host.<Deployment Name>.*
        Exclude      log /.*healthcheck.*/
        Exclude      log /.*healthcheck.*
        Exclude      log .*healthcheck.*

    [OUTPUT]
        Name                cloudwatch_logs
        Match               host.<Deployment Name>.*
        region              ap-northeast-2
        log_group_name      <CloudWatch_Log_Group_Name>
        log_stream_prefix   from-fluent-bit-
        auto_create_group   true
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: fluent-bit
  name: fluent-bit-app-config
  namespace: fluent-bit

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: deny_healthcheck_fargate_log.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to aws-observability/ConfigMap/aws-logging:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  filters.conf: "[FILTER]\n    Name     parser\n    Match    *\n    Key_name log\n
    \   Parser   crio\n    \n[FILTER]\n    Name        grep\n    Match       *\n    Exclude
    \     log /.*healthcheck.*/\n    Exclude      log /.*healthcheck.*\n    Exclude
    \     log .*healthcheck.*\n"
  flb_log_cw: "false"
  output.conf: "[OUTPUT]\n    Name cloudwatch_logs\n    Match   *\n    region ap-northeast-2\n
    \   log_group_name <CloudWatch_Log_Group_Name>\n    log_stream_prefix from-fluent-bit-\n
    \   auto_create_group true\n    log_key log\n    \n"
  parsers.conf: |
    [PARSER]
        Name crio
        Format Regex
        Regex ^(?<time>[^ ]+) (?<stream>stdout|stderr) (?<logtag>P|F) (?<log>(?:(?!healthcheck).)*)$
        Time_Key    time
        Time_Format %!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING)T%!H(MISSING):%!M(MISSING):%!S(MISSING).%!L(MISSING)%!z(MISSING)
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: aws-logging
  namespace: aws-observability

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: deny-privileged-container-policy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingAdmissionPolicy/deny-privileged-container-policy.example.com:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingAdmissionPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-privileged-container-policy.example.com
  namespace: default
spec:
  failurePolicy: Fail
  matchConstraints:
    resourceRules:
    - apiGroups:
      - ""
      apiVersions:
      - v1
      operations:
      - CREATE
      - UPDATE
      resources:
      - pods
  validations:
  - expression: object.spec.containers.all(container, !(has(container.securityContext))
      || !(has(container.securityContext.privileged)) || container.securityContext.privileged
      != true)
    message: Privileged container is not allowed.
    reason: Forbidden

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: deny-privileged-container-policy-binding.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingAdmissionPolicyBinding/deny-privileged-container-policy-binding.example.com:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingAdmissionPolicyBinding
metadata:
  name: deny-privileged-container-policy-binding.example.com
  namespace: default
spec:
  matchResources:
    namespaceSelector:
      matchLabels:
        kubernetes.io/metadata.name: ns-vap
  policyName: deny-privileged-container-policy.example.com
  validationActions:
  - Deny

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: dep.hpa.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/selenium-hub:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: selenium-hub
  name: selenium-hub
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: selenium-hub
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: selenium-hub
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: selenium/hub:4.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /wd/hub/status
            port: 4444
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: selenium-hub
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4444
        - containerPort: 4443
        - containerPort: 4442
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /wd/hub/status
            port: 4444
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: ".5"
            memory: 1000Mi

---

##### FILE: dep-api.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: simple-api
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: simple-api
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: simple-api
        version: 0.0.1
      name: api-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PORT
          value: "8080"
        image: acnaweb/simple-node-api
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: simple-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: port-api
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: api-data
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/data
        name: api-data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/api
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/api failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/api failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/api failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/api failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: dependency-var.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/myapp:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    name: myapp
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - printf UNCHANGED_REFERENCE=$UNCHANGED_REFERENCE'\n'; printf SERVICE=$SERVICE'\n';
      printf ESCAPED_SERVICE=$ESCAPED_SERVICE; sleep 120
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: SERVICE_IP
      value: 192.168.10.102
    - name: SERVICE_PORT
      value: "31111"
    - name: UNCHANGED_REFERENCE
      value: $(PROTOCAL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    - name: PROTOCAL
      value: https
    - name: SERVICE
      value: $(PROTOCAL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    - name: ESCAPED_SERVICE
      value: $$(PROTOCAL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    image: busybox
    name: myapp
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: dependent-envars.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/dependent-envars-demo:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: dependent-envars-demo
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - while true; do echo -en '\n'; printf UNCHANGED_REFERENCE=$UNCHANGED_REFERENCE'\n';
      printf SERVICE_ADDRESS=$SERVICE_ADDRESS'\n';printf ESCAPED_REFERENCE=$ESCAPED_REFERENCE'\n';
      sleep 30; done;
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    env:
    - name: SERVICE_PORT
      value: "80"
    - name: SERVICE_IP
      value: 172.17.0.1
    - name: UNCHANGED_REFERENCE
      value: $(PROTOCOL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    - name: PROTOCOL
      value: https
    - name: SERVICE_ADDRESS
      value: $(PROTOCOL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    - name: ESCAPED_REFERENCE
      value: $$(PROTOCOL)://$(SERVICE_IP):$(SERVICE_PORT)
    image: busybox
    name: dependent-envars-demo

---

##### FILE: dep-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: minikube.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: frontend
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /frontend(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend
            port:
              number: 4567
        path: /backend(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: dep-kv-secret.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dep-kv-secret:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    scope: demo
  name: dep-kv-secret
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp-secret
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp-secret
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_CONNECTION
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secret-db-connection
              name: local-secret
        image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - csi:
          driver: secrets-store.csi.k8s.io
          readOnly: true
          volumeAttributes:
            secretProviderClass: azure-kv
        name: secrets-kiz-kube-kv

---

##### FILE: depl-bbox-pvc-hostpath.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to student/Deployment/pvc1-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sv2
    mntr: a0z9-at-rambler
  name: pvc1-depl
  namespace: student
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sv2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sv2
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - bin/sh
        - -c
        - "echo Test bbox start, $HOSTNAME\nRAN=$(($RANDOM %!)(MISSING))\nsleep $RAN\necho
          \"$HOSTNAME ($RAN)  `date`\" >> /mydata/data\nRAN=$(($RANDOM %!)(MISSING))\nsleep
          $RAN\necho \"$HOSTNAME ($RAN)  `date`\" >> /mydata/data\nping 8.8.8.8 &\nsleep
          5\nkill %!\(MISSING)necho Test bbox finished, $HOSTNAME\nping 8.8.8.8              \n"
        image: dock01:5001/bbox:oct
        name: bbox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mydata
          name: vol1
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dock5001
      volumes:
      - name: vol1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-20m

---

##### FILE: dep-liveness-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dep-liveness-probe:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: dep-liveness-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: probes
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: probes
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: depl-mssql-plat.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/depl-mssql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: depl-mssql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mssql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mssql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MSSQL_PID
          value: Express
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: true
        - name: SA_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SA_PASSWORD
              name: mssql
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2019-latest
        name: mssql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1433
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql/data
          name: mssqldb
      volumes:
      - name: mssqldb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: claimss-mssql

---

    matchLabels:

        app: myapp

        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

            memory: 128Mi

            cpu: 100m
            memory: 24Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    purpose: learning
  name: deploy-1
  namespace: dev
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: create
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        company: talent
        devops: "18"
        type: create
      name: httpd
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /users
            port: 80
        name: httpd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            memory: 5Mi

##### FILE: deploy-AddtaskToDo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/addtask-todo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: addtask-todo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - addtask-todo-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: addtask-todo-deployment
      name: addtask-todo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONNECTION_STRING
          value: Driver={ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server};Server=tcp:mehul-db.database.windows.net,1433;Database=todo;Uid=mehuladmin;Pwd=ME@open#321;Encrypt=yes;TrustServerCertificate=no;Connection
            Timeout=30;
        image: mehul005a/addtask-microtodo:latest
        name: addtask-todo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/rbac-ns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: rbac-ns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: rbac-ns
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: deploy-anti.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: app1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app1
        appGroup: affinitydemo
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: appGroup
                operator: In
                values:
                - affinitydemo
            topologyKey: topology.kubernetes.io/zone
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 750m

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lucasycosta/api-gateway:latest
        name: containerapi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

kind: Deployment

  name: api-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway

      labels:

          value: production-microservice
        image: richardchesterwood/k8s-fleetman-api-gateway:release1

##### FILE: deploy-api-gateway10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api-gateway:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: spring.profiles.active
              name: udemy-k8s-cm
        image: richardchesterwood/k8s-fleetman-api-gateway:performance
        name: api-gateway
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 200Mi

---

kind: Deployment

kind: Deployment

  name: api-gateway

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway

              key: spring.profiles.active

        name: api-gateway

    matchLabels:
      app: api-gateway
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api-gateway
    spec:

      - env:

        name: api-gateway
