policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deploy-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
    env: prod
  name: deploy-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
      env: prod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        env: prod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

  template:
    metadata:

  template:

  replicas: 1

  template:
    metadata:

        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: postgres

          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_DATABASE
          value: url_shortener_db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: user
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mysecretpassword
        image: xcoulon/go-url-shortener:0.1.0
        name: go-url-shortener
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

      app: database
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: database
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: samuelgarciah9/db-itl:v1
        name: db-itl
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: db-storage
      volumes:
      - name: db-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-pvc

---

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx

    rollingUpdate: null

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/finance:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: finance
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/finance:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: finance
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/finance:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: finance
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

---

kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: finance

  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: finance
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

##### FILE: deploy-completo1_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to finance/Deployment/meu-app-1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: meu-app-1
  name: meu-app-1
  namespace: finance
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: meu-app-1
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: meu-app-1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: VERSA000000_ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: VERSAO
              name: meu-app-1-config
        - name: SENHA
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: senha
              name: meu-app-1-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: meu-app-1-config
        image: nginx:latest
        name: meu-app-1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: conteudo-do-site-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/site/
          name: secret-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: meu-app-1-config
        name: conteudo-do-site-volume
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: meu-app-1-secret
status: {}

---

##### FILE: deploy-completo1_8.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to finance/Ingress/meu-app:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: meu-app
  namespace: finance
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: meu-app.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: meu-app-1
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /meu-app-1(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
      - backend:
          service:
            name: meu-app-2
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /meu-app-2(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: ImplementationSpecific
status:
  loadBalancer: {}

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgre:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgre
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgre
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgre
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: debian:bookworm
        name: nfs-server
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: pq123
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:15.0
        name: postgre
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-vol
          subPath: pgdata
      volumes:
      - name: db-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-pvc

---

##### FILE: deploy-com-volume_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgre:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgre
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgre
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgre
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          echo "/exports *(rw,sync,no_subtree_check,no_root_squash,insecure)" > /etc/exports  && \
          exportfs -ar && \
          service nfs-kernel-server restart && \
          while true; do sleep 30; done
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - --
        image: webera/nfs
        name: nfs-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2049
          name: nfs-server-port
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: kubenews
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: pq123
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:15.0
        name: postgre
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-vol
          subPath: pgdata
      volumes:
      - name: db-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: db-pvc

---

##### FILE: deploy-count.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/echo-app-count:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: echo-application
    env: test
    version: v1.0.0
  name: echo-app-count
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo-application
      env: test
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo-application
        env: test
        version: v1.0.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: anvesh35/echo-pod-name:v3.0.0
        name: echoapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        startupProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80

---

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/echo-app-count failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to web-app/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: postgres
  name: postgres
  namespace: web-app
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: url_shortener_db
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: user
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: mysecretpassword
        image: postgres:12
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

##### FILE: deploy-delay.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dev/Deployment/deploy-1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    purpose: learning
  name: deploy-1
  namespace: dev
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      type: create
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        company: talent
        devops: "18"
        type: create
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
        name: httpd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            memory: 5Mi

---

##### FILE: deploy-DeletetaskToDo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deletetask-todo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: deletetask-todo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - deletetask-todo-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: deletetask-todo-deployment
      name: deletetask-todo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONNECTION_STRING
          value: Driver={ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server};Server=tcp:mehul-db.database.windows.net,1433;Database=todo;Uid=mehuladmin;Pwd=ME@open#321;Encrypt=yes;TrustServerCertificate=no;Connection
            Timeout=30;
        image: mehul005a/deletetasks-todo:latest
        name: deletetask-todo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/deletetask-todo-deployment

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/deletetask-todo-deployment

  storageClassName: dynamic_parameters

##### FILE: deploy-demo1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dynamic_parameters/Deployment/dynamic_parameters-deploy-demo-test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    carina.storage.io/allow-pod-migration-if-node-notready: "true"
    helm.sh/hook: test
  labels:
    app: web-server
    storageclass: dynamic_parameters
  name: dynamic_parameters-deploy-demo-test
  namespace: dynamic_parameters
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-server
      storageclass: dynamic_parameters
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        carina.storage.io/allow-pod-migration-if-node-notready: "true"
      labels:
        app: web-server
        storageclass: dynamic_parameters
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web-server
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/www/html
          name: mypvc
      volumes:
      - name: mypvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dynamic_parameters-testpvc
          readOnly: false

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: my-app
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - aws
        - s3
        - cp
        - s3://test-bucket-1-eks/index.html
        - '-'
        image: amazon/aws-cli
        name: demo-aws-cli
      serviceAccountName: demo-sa

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/external-dns:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: external-dns
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---

##### FILE: deploy-designate_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to external-dns/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: external-dns
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=ingress
        - --source=service
        - --registry=txt
        - --log-level=info
        - --domain-filter=__DOMAIN_NAME__
        - --annotation-filter=external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/register=true
        - --ignore-ingress-tls-spec
        - --txt-prefix=__PLATEFORM__.
        - --txt-owner-id=__PLATEFORM__.
        - --provider=designate
        env:
        - name: OPENSTACK_TLS_INSECURE
          value: "true"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: openstack-env
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.14.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: external-dns
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 100Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: external-dns
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane

---

##### FILE: deploy-django.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/django:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: django
    tier: frontend
  name: django
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: django
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: django
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HOST_DJANGO
          value: mariadb
        - name: DB_DJANGO
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: cm-mariadb
        - name: PWD_DJANGO
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: passwd
              name: secret-mariadb
        - name: USER_DJANGO
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: cm-mariadb
        image: jairodh/django:v1-1
        name: django
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8010
          name: django

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/drupal:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: drupal-app
  name: drupal
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: drupal-app
      tier: drupal-back-end
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: drupal-app
        tier: drupal-back-end
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: drupal:8.6
        name: drupal
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: drupal

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-ejemplo1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-ejemplo1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: contenedor-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-server
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: volumen-ejemplo1
      volumes:
      - name: volumen-ejemplo1
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-ejemplo1

---

##### FILE: deploy-elasticsearch.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elasticsearch:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elasticsearch
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elasticsearch
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elasticsearch
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
        image: elasticsearch:6.6.0
        name: elasticsearch
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sysctl
        - -w
        - vm.max_map_count=262144
        image: busybox
        name: increase-vm-max-map
        securityContext:
          privileged: true

---

kind: Deployment

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/change-cause: nginx 1.15
  name: app-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 3
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webui
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webui
      name: nginx-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.15
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: deploy-example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mynginx2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mynginx2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
      env: prod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        env: prod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=service
        - --source=ingress
        - --provider=aws
        - --aws-zone-type=public
        - --registry=txt
        - --txt-owner-id=my-hostedzone-identifier
        image: k8s.gcr.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.10.2
        name: external-dns
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65534
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gettask-todo-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gettask-todo-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - gettask-todo-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gettask-todo-deployment
      name: gettask-todo-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONNECTION_STRING
          value: Driver={ODBC Driver 17 for SQL Server};Server=tcp:mehul-db.database.windows.net,1433;Database=todo;Uid=mehuladmin;Pwd=ME@open#321;Encrypt=yes;TrustServerCertificate=no;Connection
            Timeout=30;
        image: mehul005a/gettasks-todo:latest
        name: gettask-todo-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: external-dns

  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

##### FILE: deploy-godaddy_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to external-dns/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: external-dns
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=ingress
        - --source=service
        - --registry=txt
        - --log-level=info
        - --domain-filter=__DOMAIN_NAME__
        - --annotation-filter=external-dns.alpha.kubernetes.io/register=true
        - --ignore-ingress-tls-spec
        - --txt-prefix=__PLATEFORM__.
        - --txt-owner-id=__PLATEFORM__.
        - --provider=godaddy
        - --godaddy-api-key=__GODADDY_API_KEY__
        - --godaddy-api-secret=__GODADDY_API_SECRET__
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.14.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: external-dns
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 100Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: external-dns
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane

---

##### FILE: dep-readiness-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dep-readiness-probe:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: dep-readiness-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: probes
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: probes
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80

---

##### FILE: dep-samba.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sambadb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sambadb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sambadb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sambadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - cp /setup.sh /tmp/setup.sh && chmod +x /tmp/setup.sh && /tmp/setup.sh
        image: stebanrodriguez/samba:0.1.0
        name: sambadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 139
        - containerPort: 445
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /setup.sh
          name: samba-setup
          readOnly: false
          subPath: setup.sh
        - mountPath: /home/steb/distribuidos/data
          name: samba-data
      volumes:
      - name: samba-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: samba-data-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: samba-setup
        name: samba-setup

##### FILE: dep-startup-probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dep-statup-probe:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo
  name: dep-statup-probe
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: probes
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: probes
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthy
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 15

##### FILE: dep-svc-ing-https.template_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/SITE_ID-https:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/issuer: letsencrypt-production
    kubernetes.io/ingressClassName: traefik
    traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.entrypoints: websecure
    traefik.ingress.kubernetes.io/router.tls: "true"
  name: SITE_ID-https
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: traefik
  rules:
  - host: SITE_NAME
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: SITE_ID
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - SITE_NAME
    secretName: SITE_ID-ssl-crt

---

##### FILE: dep-wikipedia.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wikipedia/Deployment/main-container-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: wikipedia-app
  name: main-container-dep
  namespace: wikipedia
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wikipedia-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wikipedia-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: website-storage
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do sleep $(($RANDOM %! (MISSING)+ 300)); curl -L https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random
          > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html; done
        image: sushashu/alpinecurl
        name: sidecar-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: website-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - curl https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kubernetes > /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
        image: sushashu/alpinecurl
        name: init-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: website-storage
      volumes:
      - name: website-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: wikipedia-pvc

---
